value.title: Manage data source credentials in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage your data source credentials in Power BI. I will show you how to:  Secure, hide your API key in the store credentials Delete your data source credentials in Power BI Edit your data source credentials in Power BI    Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: POWERFUL storytelling technique in Power BI from STORYTELLING BY DATA book
value.excerpt: Have you read the book storytelling by data? value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)
value.excerpt: In today's video, I am going to show you how you can do running totals or cummulative totals in Power Query, but do this only if you have no way to do it using DAX.  Also, I will show you how List.Range work, really cool function :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: DAX! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI
value.excerpt: Not a coder? Don't understand DAX syntax? DAX can be intimidating and difficult to learn. Frustrating even! Learning DAX can make Power BI very rewarding. Adam has some resources to get you started in your journey.  Beginning the journey:  MS Learn: User DAX in Power BI Desktop (Free) https://docs.microsoft.com/learn/paths/dax-power-bi/
